name: Snips & Snails: Yuuto's Date
description:
Come back to the world of Snips to spend an evening with your favorite incubus! Assist Yuuto with his luscious locks! Will you earnestly help out your big, grumpy boyfriend? Or will you revel being the one to tease him for once!

-----------------------------------------------------------------------

Play the full game over at: https://lacydigital.itch.io/snipsandsnails

-----------------------------------------------------------------------

Socials:

Stay up to date with me and a few behind the scenes moments on the official Snips & Snails twitter! https://twitter.com/lacydigital

Join our discord to talk about the game, get updates, and just chat about all things related to visual novels! https://discord.gg/M8BscDB
